## SectionProps interface

The configuration of a section template for a vertical's results on a universal page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SectionProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [CardComponent?](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.sectionprops.cardcomponent.md) | [CardComponent](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.cardcomponent.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The card to use for this vertical. |
|  [header?](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.sectionprops.header.md) | JSX.Element | <i>(Optional)</i> A header to display above the results. |
|  [results](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.sectionprops.results.md) | Result\[\] | The results from this vertical. |
|  [verticalKey](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.sectionprops.verticalkey.md) | string | The key for the vertical. |
|  [viewMore?](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.sectionprops.viewmore.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to allow more results to be viewed. |
